title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9.2 - Filing of assessment returns and payment of assessments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9.2 - Filing of assessment returns and payment of assessments

State Regulations

Every employer of persons working as registrants or licensees
shall, on or before the 15th day of January, April, July and October
immediately following any calendar quarter during which such employer has made
any gross payroll payments to such registrants or licensees, file with the
commission at its main administrative offices an assessment return on a form
which may be obtained from the commission and pay the assessment then due, based upon the rate as fixed by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
